Key Match Events: Bahrain scored the first goal in the 14th minute.
Indonesia equalized in the first half after a rebound.
Indonesia took the lead in the 75th minute with a curling goal.
Bahrain equalized in the 98th minute with a goal from a corner kick.
The referee allowed the match to extend beyond 90 minutes, leading to controversy.
Post-Match Reflections: Indonesia protested the referee's decision but were ignored.
The match result was a missed opportunity for Indonesia in their World Cup qualifiers.
The controversy affected Indonesia's performance and morale.
Miscellaneous Highlights: #Wasit and #AhmedAlKahf were trending topics in Indonesia.
Public reaction included frustration and criticism of the referee's decision.
Others: The match was held in Bahrain.
